Package com.group09.playit.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.group09.playit.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The class Game controller. This class is used to control the game from the UI or other components. This class functions as the interface between the UI and the game logic.

      public void notifyAllObservers()

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Card card)
      The current player plays a card.
      The card is added to the current trick.
      If the trick is full, the trick is ended and a new trick starts.
      If the round is over, the round is ended and a new round starts.
      If the game is over, the game ends.
      The game status is updated accordingly.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be played

    • legalCardsToPlay

      public ArrayList<Card> legalCardsToPlay()
      Legal cards to play for the current player.
      Returns:
      the array list of legal cards to play

    • confirmActivePlayer

      public void confirmActivePlayer(Player player)
      The current player confirms that they are the active player. The game status is updated accordingly.
      Parameters:
      player - the player

    • startRound

      public void startRound()
      Starts a new round.
